settings.content: New website coming soon - contact us for the full updated catalogue

settings.heading: Block heading
settings.content: Describe a product, make announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.heading: Mother of Pearl Signature Range
settings.description: Our very own curated selection, the Signature Range, encapsulates years of expertise, presenting architectural hardware crafted in pure brass that offers luxury quality without the luxury price tag.

settings.heading: Sun Valley Bronze
settings.description: Hailing from Idaho, Sun Valley Bronze is an emblem of hand-crafted, solid bronze mastery, bringing with it a legacy of family-owned passion and precision.

settings.heading: B&M
settings.description:
A beacon of traditional charm, B&M melds historical accuracy with
impeccable quality, right from the heart of Southern California.

settings.heading: Barben
settings.description: Barben fuses contemporary design with innovative functionality, delivering a unique aesthetic to modern spaces.

settings.heading: Brehat
settings.description: Brehat is renowned for its handcrafted glass door handles, each piece meticulously shaped in their dedicated glass studio. This brand captures the ethereal beauty of glass, blending art and function in every design.

settings.heading: Brionne
settings.description: French artistry meets functional elegance. Brionne is celebrated for its ornate, hand-finished designs, infusing old-world charm into modern spaces.

settings.heading: Chant
settings.description: Hailing from New Zealand, Chant stands out for its precision engineering, resulting in hardware that seamlessly marries form and function.

settings.heading: Domino Brass
settings.description: An artisanâ€™s touch is evident in every product, with Domino Brass renowned for its enduring, handcrafted finishes and meticulous detailing.

settings.heading: Fersa
settings.description: Spanish elegance epitomized. Fersa crafts exquisite hardware that carries the rich legacy and aesthetic of Spanish design.

settings.heading: Explore our range of renowned international brands
settings.content: We've sourced the world over, curating a selection of superior hardware from top global brands and artisan manufacturers. From European elegance to the rustic charm of hand-forged American craftsmanship, we've brought together the best in architectural hardware, under one roof.
